response.overview: Chris Bystrom's 1993 surf film subtitled 'Changing of the Guard', featuring the 30 most explosive surfers on the planet.  Experience a mind-boggling display of non-stop carving with this action-packed film. Madmen 93 captures the changing of the guard in professional surfing, showcasing the next generation of talent as they push the boundaries of performance surfing with explosive maneuvers and radical style.
response.title: Madmen '93: Changing of the Guard
